div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1682 Egypt, 1927? (378) Burial: c. 255 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 6+ AV Arsinoe II: octadr. (as Svoronos 443-489) Disposition: dispersed (cf. Naville Oct. 3, 1934, nos. 624-9, cited by Noe, but hd. not mentioned in catalogue) Noe 378: "cf. no. 140," seems to suggest that the present hd. may form part of the Benha 1922-1923 hd. (no. 1695 below), which seems unlikely
